Question: Yisheng Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Yisheng Technology Co., Ltd

Product: R5.90

- Specializes in distributed energy storage and micro-grid technology
- Global leader in integrating solar photovoltaic generation with battery storage
- Offers on/off-grid bidirectional inverters and intelligent energy management systems
- Provides complete project design, R&D, manufacturing, sales, and after-sales services for residential/commercial photovoltaic energy storage systems
- Offers portable energy storage and DC energy storage schemes
- Has its own SMT department, battery pack workshop, and testing laboratory
- Employs 25 engineers with over 10 years of experience in BMS management and inverter applications
- Offers solar generators with MPPT solar panels for efficient outdoor power supply
- Exhibiting at ees South America
- Focuses on large conference screens, live broadcast machines, smart commercial displays, smart cash registers, Internet of Things, big data, and 5G products
- Offers ETV, Eface, and EMEETING cloud platforms for information release, face recognition, and conference reservation
- Signed a strategic cooperation agreement with Shenkaihong
- Contact: Mr. Li at xiongxing@yishengtc.com
- Locations in Shenzhen, Guangzhou, and Hefei
Summary_cn:
一声科技有限公司

产品: R5.90

- 专注于分布式储能和微电网技术
- 在整合太阳能光伏发电与电池储能方面全球领先
- 提供离网/联网双向逆变器和智能能源管理系统
- 为居民/商业光伏储能系统提供完整的项目设计、研发、制造、销售和售后服务
- 提供便携式能源储存和直流能源存储方案
- 拥有自己的贴片机（SMT）部门、电池组装车间和测试实验室
- 雇佣25名在电池管理系统（BMS）管理和逆变器应用方面拥有超过10年经验的工程师
- 提供带有MPPT太阳能电池板的太阳能发电机，以实现高效的户外供电
- 正在参展南美洲ees展览会
- 关注大型会议屏幕、直播机、智能商业显示器、智能收款机、物联网、大数据和5G产品
- 提供ETV、Eface和EMEETING云平台，用于信息发布、人脸识别和会议预订
- 与申凯鸿签署了战略合作协议
- 联系人: 李先生，邮箱：xiongxing@yishengtc.com
- 地点位于深圳、广州和合肥
